description: man on left side of image wearing a black coat and boots standing on a table; his intestines are exposed and falling from an exposed area in his abdomen; in the lower right corner are the heads and shoulders of three men and a pair of open hands reaching for the figure on the table; above the heads in the background are a number of smaller figures behind the glass of a shattered window coming toward the figures in the foreground
inscription: LL margin of sheet, in pencil: 15. Dr. Rauert E.52
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 18
title: The Rebel
